org.factcenter.qilin.primitives.generic

Class TrapdoorPedersenCommitment<G>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.factcenter.qilin.primitives.generic.PedersenCommitment<G>
      • org.factcenter.qilin.primitives.generic.TrapdoorPedersenCommitment<G>
  • Type Parameters:
    G - the underlying group element type.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cipher.PK<G,java.math.BigInteger,java.math.BigInteger>, Homomorphic<G,java.math.BigInteger,java.math.BigInteger>, NonInteractiveCommitment.Committer<G,java.math.BigInteger,java.math.BigInteger>, NonInteractiveCommitment.Verifier<G,java.math.BigInteger,java.math.BigInteger>, TrapdoorNonInteractiveCommitment.EquivocatingCommitter<G,java.math.BigInteger,java.math.BigInteger>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ECTrapdoorPedersen, ZpTrapdoorPedersen

    public class TrapdoorPedersenCommitment<G>
extends PedersenCommitment<G>
implements TrapdoorNonInteractiveCommitment.EquivocatingCommitter<G,java.math.BigInteger,java.math.BigInteger>
    An implementation of PedersenCommitment over a generic group with the addition of a trapdoor for equivocation.

                                  java.math.BigInteger sk)
        Construct a new trapdoor pedersen commitment from a given group, generator and secret key. The secret key must be relatively prime to the group order (otherwise the constructor will throw an ArithmeticException.
        Parameters:

                                       java.math.BigInteger newvalue)
        Description copied from interface: TrapdoorNonInteractiveCommitment.EquivocatingCommitter
        Return a valid opening to a value for a given commitment for which some opening is known
        Specified by:
        equivocate in interface TrapdoorNonInteractiveCommitment.EquivocatingCommitter<G,java.math.BigInteger,java.math.BigInteger>
        Parameters:
        oldvalue - known opening message
        oldrandom - known opening randomness
        newvalue - value to which the commitment should be opened
        Returns:
        new randomness so that commit(newvalue,newrandom)=commit(oldvalue,oldrandom)
